content: I just read the first hivezine issue and I thought that there could be a separate studio for remix chains as I do understand how possibly annoying they could be but I do (and I'm sure others do too) love hopping on a remix chain and I think that it could be super beneficial for people that usually do post remix chains on the hive. Also if someone does post a remix chain on the main studio then there would be an easy way to redirect them to the right place. /gen /nm
